labels: admob phonegap android ios cordova plugin
name: phonegap admob
short_description:
admob phonegap(cordova) plugin ==================== phonegap admob plugin(cordova admob plugin ) is a phonegap plugin enable html5 developer to add admob native ad to ios and android app admob phonegap(cordova) plugin，support ios and android build base on phonegap 3.4 or cordova 5,admob ios sdk 6.10.0 ,admob google play service 7.3 home:http://code.google.com/p/admob-phonegap/ sourcefore: http://sourceforge.net/projects/phonegap-admob/ ### 1.install admob phonegap plugin use the cordova command
download the plugin ,then install with local location cordova plugin add c:\phonegap-admob-plugin or install cordova plugin online cordova plugin add com.admob.plugin use the phonegap command
download the plugin ,then install with local location phonegap plugin add c:\phonegap-admob-plugin document. http://sourceforge.net/p/phonegap-admob/wiki/?source=navbar contact:gooogleadmob@gmail.com
summary: phonegap admob plugin(cordova admob plugin )for ios and android
